content.html:
SHUTTER TYPE


Choose the shutter type. Choose the electronic shutter to mute
the shutter sound.

OptionDescription
MS MECHANICAL SHUTTERTake pictures with the mechanical shutter.
ES ELECTRONIC SHUTTERTake pictures with the electronic shutter.
M+E MECHANICAL + ELECTRONICThe camera chooses the mechanical or electronic shutter according to shooting conditions.

When using the electronic shutter, note the following:
● For faster shutter speeds, set the shutter speed dial to 4000 or T and
rotate the front command dial.
● Distortion may be visible in shots of moving subjects.
● Distortion may also be visible in hand-held shots taken at high shut-
ter speeds; use of a tripod is recommended.
● Banding and fog may occur in shots taken under fluorescent lights or
other flickering or erratic illumination.
● When taking pictures with the shutter muted (目目 214), respect your
subjects'image rights and right to privacy.

The following restrictions apply when the electronic shutter is used:
● "Extended" sensitivity values are not supported
● Long exposure noise reduction has no effect
● The flash cannot be used


The
Shooting
Menus
146
content.markdown:
# SHUTTER TYPE

# Choose the shutter type. Choose the electronic shutter to mute
the shutter sound.

| Option | Description |
| --- | --- |
| MS MECHANICAL SHUTTER | Take pictures with the mechanical shutter. |
| ES ELECTRONIC SHUTTER | Take pictures with the electronic shutter. |
| M+E MECHANICAL + ELECTRONIC | The camera chooses the mechanical or electronic shutter according to shooting conditions. |


- When using the electronic shutter, note the following:
- ● For faster shutter speeds, set the shutter speed dial to 4000 or T and
- rotate the front command dial.
- ● Distortion may be visible in shots of moving subjects.
- ● Distortion may also be visible in hand-held shots taken at high shut-
- ter speeds; use of a tripod is recommended.
- ● Banding and fog may occur in shots taken under fluorescent lights or
- other flickering or erratic illumination.
- ● When taking pictures with the shutter muted (目目 214), respect your
- subjects'image rights and right to privacy.


- The following restrictions apply when the electronic shutter is used:
- ● "Extended" sensitivity values are not supported
- ● Long exposure noise reduction has no effect
- ● The flash cannot be used
